attributes.action: Ban dogs in the street within a 200mtr radius of any primary, infant or nursery school during school hours and 30 minutes before and after.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many young children are terrified of dogs and have to run the daily guantlet of some thoughtless parents and relatives collecting their offspring from the school gate complete with dog(s). Some of these dogs are dangerous breeds, or very similar to dangerous breeds and often unmuzzled. Apart from the daily fear experienced by many children negotiating these animals, it is only a matter of time before one of them causes a disaster.
